meanings.sent1: The detective found the inferrible clues at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: Her inferrible decision-making skills impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: It was an inferrible sight to see a cat chasing its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The inferrible connection between the two events left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The inferrible logic behind the puzzle made it challenging to solve.

meanings.definition: That can be deduced or concluded.
meanings.sent1: The scientist made an inferrible prediction based on the experiment results.
meanings.sent2: The inferrible outcome of the test surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: It was inferrible that the cake disappeared so quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The inferrible truth finally came to light after years of speculation.
meanings.sent5: The inferrible answer to the riddle was revealed by the clever child.
